## Problem 1
### Create tidy dataframe

#### Generate dataframe containing all file names

```{r}
# Create dataframe containing all 20 file names in the directory
file_df = tibble(
  list.files(path = ".//data", all.files = FALSE)) 
  
names(file_df)[1] = "file_name"

file_df
```
